subject: Re: Virtual meeting with Flock
body:
[EXTERNAL ?]

Yes, I will send the invite and leave it open so you can add your city attorney to it. Thank you for the quick reply! 
	
 
Caroline Fraher
Account Executive

On Thu, Mar 6, 2025 at 1:24?PM COSTIN Timothy M <TCostin@eugene-or.gov TCostin@eugene-or.gov > wrote:


	Hello Caroline,

	 

	Can Flock�s legal team meet Thursday 3/13/25 in the afternoon around 2:30 PST virtually? I have connected with our City attorney and it sounds like that timeline works well. 

	 

	Best,

	 

	Tim Costin

	Sr. Financial Analyst

	Eugene Police Department

	300 Country Club Road

	Eugene, Oregon 97401

	Office: (541) 682-8364

	Cell: (541) 844-9015

	 

	From: BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov > 
	Sent: Thursday, March 6, 2025 12:44 PM
	To: Caroline Fraher <caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com >; COSTIN Timothy M <TCostin@eugene-or.gov TCostin@eugene-or.gov >
	Cc: CHOTERUNGRUANGKORN Nikki <NChoterungruangkorn@eugene-or.gov NChoterungruangkorn@eugene-or.gov >
	Subject: Virtual meeting with Flock

	 

	Tim, 

	 

	Can we try to arrange a virtual meeting between our legal teams and Caroline and myself for next week?  This would be to discuss any issues and hopefully finalize the contract.   Earlier in the week is preferred.  Here are some days and times that may work.  Please let me know and we can set up a calendar invite.  

	 

	Tuesday- After 11

	Wednesday-  8-9, 11am, or anytime after 12pm

	Thursday-  Anytime except 1p-2p.  

	 

	Thank you 

	 

	 

	Jake Burke

	Captain � Investigations Division

	Eugene Police Department

	300 Country Club Road

	Eugene, Oregon 97401

	(541) 682-5895 work

thread_messages.subject: Virtual meeting with Flock
thread_messages.body:
Tim, 

	 

	Can we try to arrange a virtual meeting between our legal teams and Caroline and myself for next week?  This would be to discuss any issues and hopefully finalize the contract.   Earlier in the week is preferred.  Here are some days and times that may work.  Please let me know and we can set up a calendar invite.  

	 

	Tuesday- After 11

	Wednesday-  8-9, 11am, or anytime after 12pm

	Thursday-  Anytime except 1p-2p.  

	 

	Thank you 

	 

	 

	Jake Burke

	Captain � Investigations Division

	Eugene Police Department

	300 Country Club Road

	Eugene, Oregon 97401
